cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.bitty-appreciation-bad: Well, I'm not gonna lie. She looks more like a pampered child than a proper leader to me.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.bitty-appreciation-good: Seems like a tightly run operation to me. Her workers respect her, and the townfolks fear her.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.bitty-appreciation-medium: She seems to be doing okay. The mine could produce more, and she's trying to improve those results.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.bitty-appreciation-reject: Honestly, I don't think I have enough experience to judge.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.hide-bibin-involvement: We've caught the pony who was planting explosives at the mine.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.hide-bibin-involvement-alt: Eyup. That's all I had to say.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion:
As she notices you, this old mare hastly reaches for a laser gun and points it at your head.

Who the hell are you, and what are you doing here ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-bitty: I see. Next time, I advise you make yourself announced. I could've blown your head off, just now.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-evasive: I was just looking around ! Don't shoot !
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-explore: You like to explore ? That's rich. How did you slip through my secretary's gaze ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-on-sneaked-in: Are you now ? That's a pretty useful skill. Good for you. But I guess it doesn't work on everyone, because you definitely caught my attention. Would you be interested in working with the Potiok family ? I have just the right job for someone of your caliber.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-on-sneaked-in-accept-job: It would be an honor to be of service to the Potioks.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-on-sneaked-in-accept-job-alt: I might be interested, if you make it worth my time.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-questions: You're not going anywhere until you've told me what you were snooping around for. I will kick your flank and wrap it up like winter's over. Go on, spill the beans, I'm listening.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-secretary-wasnt-there: I didn't see any secretary. Maybe she just wasn't there ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion-sneaked-in: I guess I'm just good at going around unnoticed.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.intrusion/entry: Do you think I'm just gonna let you go ? What were you snooping around for ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.on-bitty-intrusion-secrecy: I understand. But considering the information I bring to you, I believe it was a good decision to keep our meeting secret.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.praise-bitty-reason-loyalty: Bitty recruited me and paid me. I feel like I owe her some loyalty.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.prompt: You wanted to see me ? What is it ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.report: Yes, did you find out anything new ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.report-bibin-involvement: It turns out Bibin was responsible for the sabotages. He arranged for a slummer to become water carrier at Hillburrow. The slummer then planted explosives.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage-report: Bitty wants you to know that we've just stopped a ploy to sabotage the coal mine.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage-report-ask-more-slaves: Some of the slaves and tools were destroyed by the saboteurs. Maybe if you could help Bitty get back on track, the production could start stepping up sooner rather than later.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage-report-confirm-mine-output: Yeah, Bitty will manage for sure.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/about-saboteur: Interesting. And, pray tell, what happened to this saboteur ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/about-saboteur-disappeared: That is very disappointing. I see that Bitty didn't take care of the situation in the best of ways. Now that the culprit is off the equation, she cannot find out his motives, or who else might have a grudge against her.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/about-saboteur-tortured: Good. You did the right thing. I'm glad to learn about this, it sounds like Bitty has taken care of the situation with an iron hoof. I expected nothing less.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/asked-for-supplies: Bitty's responsible for her own failures. Anyhow, I assigned her a budget. If she doesn't find a way to make do, I'll find somepony who will. I can think of a few siblings who'd like to have her responsibilities.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/bitty-leadership/on-bad: Watch your mouth. It's my grand-daughter you're talking about. That being said, I'm not surprised by your reaction. She has a hard time getting respected by her pairs... and even her lessers. Very well. I've taken note of your opinion. Now tell me what it is that you had to tell me.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/bitty-leadership/on-good: Really now ? I find that hard to believe. Why are you so keen on defending her ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/bitty-leadership/on-loyalty: Your loyalty is commendable. But when you're in my office, you will tell me nothing but the truth. Now what did you need to tell me ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/bitty-leadership/on-medium: A fair and respectful response, I believe. It's to be expected. I sent Bitty there to hone her skills as a leader. If you're telling me the truth, then she's doing her best, and that's all I expect from her. Good. Now, what is it that you came here to tell me ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/bitty-leadership/on-skip: A sensible choice, given your position. I can appreciate somepony who knows when not to run his mouth. Very well. What was it that motivated this visit of yours ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/entry: So you're here to bring me news from Bitty. I assume you've been to the coal mine then. How would you say that things are going there ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/exit: Well. This matter is closed. Thank you for your cooperation. You may leave my office, now. I have work to do.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/on-take-blame-for-culprit: It was Bitty's responsibility to chose the proper contractor for the task. If you weren't up for the task, then neither was she. Your loyalty is commendable, but it won't alter my judgement.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/report: My, oh my. Does that mean the mine's output will finally grow up to our expectations ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sabotage/report-follow-up: So. No more sabotage at the mine. Is that all that you had to tell me ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.saboteur-escaped-bitty-blame: I guess she isn't the leader you'd like her to be.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.saboteur-escaped-take-blame: Bitty isn't responsible. I'm the one who failed. I couldn't capture the culprit alive.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.saboteur-interrogated-by-bitty: I brought him to Bitty. She interrogated him and had him killed for his crimes.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.saboteur-killed-by-player: He tried to get rid of me when I confronted him. I had no choice but to kill him.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.saboteur-slipped-away: I found definitive proof that he was involved... but he slipped away before we could arrest him.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job-reentry: Can you tell me again about the job involving Bibin ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job-report: About the spy you sent at Bibin's...
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/about-reward: I see you know how to do business. I will pay you {{sneakJobReward}} caps once the job is done. Is that okay with you ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/accept: I'm sure of it. I will solve the problem and come back to you at once.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/accept-reward: It's a fair price. You can count on me.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/ask-more-reward: It's a dangerous job. I'm staking my own life there. I think it's worth more than {{sneakJobReward}} caps.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/ask-reward: Sure, I'll do it. How much are you ready to invest in that project ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/entry: I sent somepony to infiltrate Bibin's home and keep an eye on him. We've lost contact sometime ago. It's safe to assume that they've either been caught or turned their coat. I'm hoping you'll be more trustworthy than they were. I want you to find out what happened to them. If they betrayed me, or if they got captured... do whatever you see fit to ensure they won't act against us, or give away any information about us to Bibin. Do you think you could do that ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/increase-reward: That's a fair point. You do look talented enough. I guess I could invest a little more in you. How about {{sneakJobReward}} ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/on-accepted: Good. Get on with it then. I'll see you later.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/on-rejected: That's a shame. Such wasted talent. Well then, this meeting is over, you may take your leave.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/pre-entry: Ah ! Don't give me none of that crap. You want to get close to us Potioks ? Just listen to me, and I'll make sure you're well taken care of.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/pre-entry-alt: I'm not worried about that. You look like you have a lot of free time.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/reject: I don't think I can. It wouldn't be easy, and if I get caught, I'll just cause you even more trouble.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/reject-reward: I'm sorry, I'm not risking my life for this much.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/report: Yes ? Did you find out anything new ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.sneak-job/reward-not-increased: I understand your concern, but I'm working on limited funds... and if you do get caught, it'll cause even more trouble. So how about we both bet you'll come back alive and successful, and get paid a reasonable amount of money for it ?
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.was-sent-by-bitty: I've been sent by Bitty Potiok. I have important information to relay.
cristal-den/potioks/matriarch.was-sent-by-no-one: But it's true ! I wasn't looking for anything specific... this bunker is cool and I just like to explore !
